Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Elevators.Modules.Motors

Interface BaseElevatorMotor

All Known Implementing Classes:
FalconElevatorMotor, KrakenElevatorMotor
public interface BaseElevatorMotor
Interface representing a base elevator motor with default implementations for motor control, position tracking, and configuration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    configAngleMotor()
    Configures the angle motor with default settings.
    default double
    getErrorPosition()
    Gets the error in position of the steer motor.

    Gets the current position of the steer motor.
    default void
    setAngle(double rotations)
    Sets the angle of the motor using the internal PID controller.
    default void
    setControl(double percent)
    Sets the motor control using a percentage output.

    Sets the motor control using a VoltageOut object.
    default void

    Sets the absolute position of the steer motor.
    default void
    stopMotor()
    Stops the motor safely.
    default BaseElevatorMotor
    withMotionMagic(MotionMagicWrapper mmConfigs)
    Applies Motion Magic configuration to the elevator motor.

  • Method Details

    • configAngleMotor

      default void configAngleMotor()
      Configures the angle motor with default settings.

    • setAngle

      default void setAngle(double rotations)
      Sets the angle of the motor using the internal PID controller.
      Parameters:
      rotations - The desired angle in rotations.

    • setControl

      default void setControl(double percent)
      Sets the motor control using a percentage output.
      Parameters:
      percent - The percentage of power to apply to the motor.

    • setControl

      default void setControl(VoltageOut output)
      Sets the motor control using a VoltageOut object.
      Parameters:
      output - The voltage output control for the motor.

    • getPosition

      default double getPosition()
      Gets the current position of the steer motor.
      Returns:
      The position of the steer motor in rotations.

    • getErrorPosition

      default double getErrorPosition()
      Gets the error in position of the steer motor.
      Returns:
      The position error in rotations.

    • setPosition

      default void setPosition(double absolutePosition)
      Sets the absolute position of the steer motor.
      Parameters:
      absolutePosition - The desired absolute position in rotations.

    • stopMotor

      default void stopMotor()
      Stops the motor safely.

    • withMotionMagic

      default BaseElevatorMotor withMotionMagic(MotionMagicWrapper mmConfigs)
      Applies Motion Magic configuration to the elevator motor.
      Parameters:
      mmConfigs - The Motion Magic configuration wrapper.
      Returns:
      A new BaseElevatorMotor instance with Motion Magic settings applied.

    • withSoftwareLimit

      default BaseElevatorMotor withSoftwareLimit(SoftwareLimitWrapper limitsWrapper)
      Applies software limit settings to the elevator motor.
      Parameters:
      limitsWrapper - The software limit configuration wrapper.
      Returns:
      A new BaseElevatorMotor instance with software limit settings applied.
